function EP02_01()
    --.序章【4月第1週】「百合愛学園男子部」
    SaveData.Title = "百合愛学園男子部"

SAVE()

    -- 【指示説明】

    --　//BG：背景の指定
    --　//BU：バストアップの指定
    --　//SE：効果音の指定
    --　//CI：カットインの指定
    --　//effect：演出の希望
    --　◆：シーン切り替え
    --　￥：黒塗りハートの記号（主にエルメスが多用）

    -- ◆第２話
    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890

    -- トレーニングパラメーター保存
    -- ヴィジュアル
    SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Visual = SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual
    -- 教養
    SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Intelligence = SaveData.TrainingParam.Intelligence
    -- 精神
    SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Mental = SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental


    --//BG：百合愛学園正門（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[Half a day had passed since the unexpected commotion at the entrance ceremony. I was once again at the main gate of Yuriai Private Academy to attend the boys' division entrance ceremony.]])

    MSG([[As expected of a school boasting over a hundred years of history, the main gate was magnificently built with a solemn dignity.]])

    MSG([[Bathed in the glow of the setting sun, it looked like a work of art in itself.]])

    STOP_BGM(500)

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[In front of that beautiful gate stood a half-naked boy.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0187.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised (This uniform is the same Yuriai Private Academy one... c-could he be a classmate?)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM20.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0001.wav")
    MSG([[【？？？？】*Ouga laughs boisterously* "Haa—hahaha! What a beautiful sunset! It’s coloring my body in shades of crimson!"]])

    MSG([[The boy was holding a golden selfie stick and was repeatedly snapping photos of himself with his smartphone.]])

    MSG([[I wanted to speak to him, but his appearance was too suspicious. If a teacher happened to pass by, he would surely be restrained.]])

    MSG([[I wondered what to do as I hid behind a nearby utility pole, quietly observing the situation.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0002.wav")
    MSG([[【Half-naked boy】Normal "Hm. Hey, you hiding there!"]])
    -- //オウガ

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0188.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Eek!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

MSG([[I’d been spotted. Suddenly called out, I instinctively straightened up. The boy confidently approached and reached out his hand casually.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0003.wav")
    MSG([[【Half-naked boy】Smiling "That uniform says you’re a boy in Yuriai Private Academy too, right?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0004.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smiling "I’m Ouga Rokujou. I’ll be your classmate. Looking forward to the next three years."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0189.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Huh? Y-yeah! P-pleased to meet you...!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0005.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "No need to be so nervous. Calm down and tell me your name first."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0190.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Ah... I-I'm Minato Ikusa."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[He was surprisingly sensible. Judging someone by how they look—what a fool I am. I really need to reflect on that...]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0006.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "What’s the matter? Are you admiring my muscular physique?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0191.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile, sweat "Eh? Ah, no, that’s not quite it..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0007.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smiling "Don’t be shy. There’s no man who wouldn’t be thrilled to see this perfect body."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0008.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smiling "I always carry my custom selfie stick, the ‘Excalibur,’ so I can capture my muscles at any time!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0009.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Boisterous laugh "Haa—hahaha! True beauty is muscle! I will show Yuriai Private Academy the excellence of my physique!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0192.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile, sweat (He seems like a nice guy, but yeah, he’s a bit odd... I guess.)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I smiled wryly and, as Ouga encouraged me, I stared intently at his body.]])

    MSG([[His body dyed by the sunset had a thick chest and abs like steel. Honestly, I envy him since my body doesn’t build muscle easily.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0193.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Normal "You really do have an impressive physique. Do you play any sports?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0010.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smiling "Of course. I’m the representative of the Rokujou Group. I handle every sport called such—from ball games to track and field, and even free running."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0011.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "By the way, my favorite sport is kabaddi."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0194.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised "A-amazing...!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0195.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised (Wait? Did he just say representative of a group?)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I might have misheard, and it felt rude to ask so directly on first meeting, so I held back from questioning.]])

    MSG([[Just then, a familiar teacher walked out from the school.]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",1000,true)

    --//BU：モブ女性、オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0006.wav")
    MSG([[【Female Teacher】 "Minato Ikusa. Ouga Rokujou. The entrance ceremony is about to begin, so please gather."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0196.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised (Oh! The teacher who chased after me this morning!)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[Noticing me, the teacher’s eyes widened in surprise.]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0007.wav")
    MSG([[【Female Teacher】 "Oh? You..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0008.wav")
    MSG([[【Female Teacher】 "Good grief... It really was just a mix-up with the time. Sorry for the misunderstanding, but this is terribly inconvenient."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0197.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Sad "I-I'm sorry..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0009.wav")
    MSG([[【Female Teacher】 "Well, it’s fine. Thanks to your cousin, Hermes-san is safe."]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0010.wav")
    MSG([[【Female Teacher】 "I’ll overlook it for Erika Ikusa’s sake. Boys entering the girls' division face severe punishment, so be careful from now on."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0198.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Serious "Y-yes."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[To think my crossdressing performance would cause my ‘crime’ to be pardoned. Somehow... it felt like a very strange experience.]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0011.wav")
    MSG([[【Itou-sensei】 "Ah, I’m late with introductions. I’m Saya Itou, who also serves as the boys’ division homeroom teacher."]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0012.wav")
    MSG([[【Itou-sensei】 "I will fulfill my duties as homeroom teacher properly, so I look forward to working with you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0199.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Smiling "Thank you, Itou-sensei. I look forward to working with you."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0012.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Now then, Itou-sensei, please lead us to the entrance ceremony hall. Though it’s April, it’s still chilly. It must be tough on Minato, who wears no armor of flesh like me."]])

    MSG([[Ouga said this while looking far colder than I felt.]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0013.wav")
    MSG([[【Itou-sensei】 "No need to move. It will be over quickly."]])

    MSG([[Saying so, the teacher calmly proceeded to deliver congratulatory words on our enrollment, read messages from the principal, and introduce Yuriai Private Academy’s culture.]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0014.wav")
    MSG([[【Itou-sensei】 "That concludes the entrance ceremony. Now, please come this way as I introduce your school buildings."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0200.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Eh?! It’s over!!??"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[It ended so abruptly I couldn’t help but raise my voice. If this were a story, the description would probably have been cut for its brevity.]])

    MSG([[There was just too little content.]])

    MSG([[The girls' division had a spectacular entrance ceremony, but this gap feels way too big...]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0015.wav")
    MSG([[【Itou-sensei】 "You should consider yourselves lucky to have an entrance ceremony at all for just two students. Frankly, we teachers are strongly opposed to the creation of a boys’ division."]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --//BU：オウガ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[She said this bluntly and walked straight into the school. Ouga and I exchanged glances and laughed.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0201.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile, sweat "Ouga, it seems like we’ve entered a pretty difficult school, huh."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0013.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smiling "Hah, bring it on. I will challenge this irrational school as a trial to become the true king."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0014.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "From now on, we’re comrades facing battle together. Drop the formalities and just call me ‘Ouga.’"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0202.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Smiling "O-okay. Once again, nice to meet you, Ouga."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[It seemed tough, but I felt relieved to have made a friend so soon among my classmates.]])

    MSG([[And so began my school life as Minato Ikusa.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

--STOP_BGM()

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//effect：サブタイトル表示

    -- 第２話「ボク姫様と姫制度」


    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_02")
end
